title: No seriously, I think the undo button is broken.
body: It won't even let me undo while in shop now????????????? I never left the fountain either.

replies.body: The shopkeeper has to feed his family bro...No Refunds!
At the cost of his family getting food I had to go without my Null Magic Mantle. Not worth
The shopkeeper needs to make a living you know
I'd be more than happy to lend him the 50 gold I get from the Nexus, the undo button working would greatly aid me in getting there :P
Is it with a specific item in particular? Or over all item buys?
I can't remember specifically which items but it's happened to quite a lot lately
